name: sfpwowerscript-installunlockedpackage-task
friendlyName: Install an unlocked package to an org
description: Installs an unlocked package to an org
helpMarkDown: Installs an unlocked package by passing the build artifact, azure artifact or by passing the package version id
author: dxatscale@accenture.com

inputs.name: envname
inputs.label: Alias or username of the target environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alias/Target User Name of the environment

inputs.name: package
inputs.label: Name of the package to be installed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the package to be installed

inputs.name: packageinstalledfrom
inputs.label: Package to be installed From

options.AzureArtifact: Utilize universal artifacts published to Azure Artifacts
options.Custom: Pass the package version id as an argument

inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option from where the package version is to be picked up for install

inputs.name: package_version_id
inputs.label: Package Version ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the pipeline's build number to the the project's incremented version number

inputs.name: artifact
inputs.label: Name of the artifact (source alias ) that is attached to this release pipeline
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the artifact which is the input to this pipeline. Please note only sfpowerkit based build artifact will work with this command

inputs.name: installationkey
inputs.label: Installation Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Installation key for key-protected package (default: null)

inputs.name: apexcompileonlypackage
inputs.label: Compile Apex from only the package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Each package installation triggers a compilation of apex,uncheck to trigger entire org compilation on every package installation

inputs.name: security_type
inputs.label: Security access type for the installed package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the security access for the package installation

inputs.name: upgrade_type
inputs.label: Upgrade type for the installed package
inputs.helpMarkDown: the upgrade type for the package installation

inputs.name: wait_time
inputs.label: Wait Time
inputs.helpMarkDown: wait time for command to finish in minutes

inputs.name: publish_wait_time
inputs.label: Publish Wait Time
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of minutes to wait for subscriber package version ID to become available in the target org

inputs.name: skip_on_missing_artifact
inputs.label: Skip If no artifact is found
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do not fail the task if attached artifact is missing,Use it to skip artifact installation by removing attached artifacts
